metadata.title: Hash Generator - Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 Hashes | tool-chest
metadata.description: Free online hash generator for MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, and other hash algorithms. Generate secure hashes for text and files with client-side processing.

md5.title: MD5
md5.description: 128-bit hash function. Fast but not cryptographically secure. Use for checksums only.

sha1.title: SHA-1
sha1.description: 160-bit hash function. Legacy algorithm, use SHA-256+ for security applications.

sha256.title: SHA-256
sha256.description: 256-bit hash function. Secure and widely used standard for modern applications.

sha512.title: SHA-512
sha512.description: 512-bit hash function. Maximum security for sensitive data and critical applications.

securityGuidelines.title: Security Guidelines
items: MD5 and SHA-1 are cryptographically broken and should not be used for security-critical applications
Use SHA-256 or SHA-512 for all security-sensitive applications and modern systems
